official_title: A bill to amend the Capital Construction Fund.

summary.text: Amends the Merchant Marine Act, 1936, to include on the list of ships eligible to establish a capital construction fund certain ships involved in international trade. Adjusts the amounts to be deposited by specified individuals in such fund. Redefines "eligible vessel," "qualified vessel," and "foreign fishing corporation" for the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Capital Construction Fund.
